Description: Ostracon, section (two fragments joined) of the body of a drab-coloured pottery vessel, the fabric contains many small white inclusions, the exterior is covered with a cream-coloured slip and remains of two lines of black-painted hieratic text.
Findspot: Excavated/Findspot: Amarna, el-, TA:32-33/P41.6/152 (larger fragment) TA:32-33/P41.6/153 (smaller fragment)
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (394034) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/394034)
